misc: His usual shot shape could be described as a "power draw".
biography: Jussi, a familiar face at the Hector Trophée, is known for his powerful presence on the course and his dedication to the sport. Representing St. Laurence Golf, Jussi brings a unique blend of skill and determination to every competition.

With a penchant for shaping his shots into a power draw, Jussi's style is both aggressive and calculated, making him a formidable competitor in individual play. While the coveted Hector Trophée and Victor Trophy have eluded him thus far, Jussi's commitment to improvement remains unwavering. He has participated in the Hector Trophée 4 times.

Off the course, Jussi is known for his calm demeanor and sportsmanship, embodying the true spirit of the game. Although he is not expected to participate in the upcoming Hector Trophée 2025, his presence is always felt, and a last-minute change could always bring him back into the fold. The golfing community eagerly anticipates his future endeavors and contributions to the sport.
